Text.Page:
The mighty sorcerer Oshar has experiments of his own, of course. I don't pretend to understand them...yet.

I know he always appreciates a shipment of wing dust from fiery tentacullars.

Of course, the tentacullars don't exactly give up their wing dust willingly. Wait...I have an idea!

You've got the wing dust, right?

Oshar and I will richly reward you on the day of reckoning, when our school of sorcery ascends to become...what? You want a more immediate reward? Of course.

Sorry. Got a little carried away there.
The great sorcerer Oshar says wing dust is the source of the tentacullar's power. Go get some!
